title: Counter-Strike: Classic Offensive
text:
Jan 1 2017 
From the mod page on steam: 1.1c: 
- Fixed some exploits to Dust2 and it's winter version. (thanks to OZone999 and all of you guys ) - Italy and Inferno as well. - Changed Inferno's skybox as well as the general ambient - Replaced the old crates from Inferno with new HD ones. 
- Replaced the M4A1 with the one from CS:GO (to avoid Copyright issues) - Replaced the Galil with the one from CS:S (for the same reason) - Edited the Scout's texture 
- Fixed C4 sound that could be muffled 
- Added aim_map_csco (known as "Combat/Skill Desert" in CS:CO) - aim_map_csco Includes a wall at the beginning of the round so you can't shoot people instantly when freezetime ends and crates are correctly sized 
- Added custom Leet models tm_phoenix_variant_leet_b and tm_phoenix_variant_leet_r which are used in aim_map_csco, and also tm_phoenix_variant_leet_color which can be colored using plugins or with "rendercolor" 
- Radio commands translations are now possible, exemples are inside the #TRANSLATION folder, availiable languages are german and french, just open the folder and copy the sound folder over the one in the root folder of the mod 
- Fixed the "Round Draw" message or CT win etc... - Finally fixed SV_PURE, you can now put it to 1 (thanks to hrallONE) EpicSamaritan Jan 1 2017 
>- Radio commands translations are now possible, exemples are inside the #TRANSLATION folder, availiable languages are german and french, just open the folder and copy the sound folder over the one in the root folder of the mod< Nice. Because I remember one really good russian fan-made radio voice.
